segments.text: My eyes keep going back to that overflowing sink.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The steady stream of water over the edge is relentless.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's creating a truly disgusting puddle on the floor.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The poor cabinet doors are getting soaked, and they'll warp eventually.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can just imagine the squelch underfoot if I were to step there.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman's foot is already submerged, yet she shows no sign of it.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's incredible how focused she is on that single plate.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Meanwhile, the children are risking a bad fall on that wet surface.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Someone really needs to turn off that faucet immediately.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This whole scene feels like a snapshot of controlled chaos.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The water itself seems to have a life of its own, just flowing.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: What a mess this kitchen is going to be in soon.
segments.speaker: PAR
